section.p: This chapter introduces , an open-source application service orchestrator based on (Docker CE, or just Docker).

is a platform-as-a-service framework that can manage any Docker application, from a simple web application to a multi-tiered stateful application stack. is based on a service-oriented architecture, which enables applications to run as a set of distributed services spanning hosts, datacenters, and geographic regions.

relies on declarations of application requirements to integrate Docker containers. A service definition template contains the specifications of application services in JSON format. The definition of each service includes the IDs of the Docker images needed to run the service.
